      • connect

        public final void connect​(SocketAddress remoteAddress,
                          SocketAddress localAddress,
                          Promise<Void> promise)
        Description copied from interface: Channel.Unsafe
        Connect the Channel of the given Future with the given remote SocketAddress. If a specific local SocketAddress should be used it need to be given as argument. Otherwise just pass null to it. The Promise will get notified once the connect operation was complete.
        Specified by:
        connect in interface Channel.Unsafe
